definition: Chinese character/CL:個|个[ge4]/Japanese: kanji/Korean: hanja/Vietnamese: hán tự
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
Second Chinese Character Simplification Scheme (second round of simplified Chinese characters, proposed in 1977 and retracted in 1986)/abbr. to 二簡|二简[er4 jian3]
pinyin: Di4 er4 ci4 Han4 zi4 Jian3 hua4 Fang1 an4

definition: Unihan/China Japan Korea (CJK) unified ideographs/abbr. for 中日韓統一表意文字|中日韩统一表意文字[Zhong1 Ri4 Han2 tong3 yi1 biao3 yi4 wen2 zi4]
UCS, Chinese character coding adopted in PRC 1986/abbr. to 通用碼|通用码[tong1 yong4 ma3]
pinyin: tong1 yong4 Han4 zi4 biao1 zhun3 jiao1 huan4 ma3

sentences.english: He bought an English-Chinese dictionary in order to look up the words he doesn't know.
sentences.chinese: 他买了本英汉字典，以便查找他不认识的单词。

sentences.english: A system of handwritten Chinese characters recognition based on feedback structure is constructed.
sentences.chinese: 构建一种基于反馈结构的手写体汉字识别系统。

sentences.english: The logo must incorporate both the Chinese characters and the English name of the restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 该标志必须包含两个汉字和餐厅的英文名称。

sentences.english: In this paper, we present a method which generates Chinese character of arbitrary sizes from thinned character pattern.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了一种对汉字作任意倍率放缩的算法。

sentences.english: It discussed Hanzi input, display and output function.
sentences.chinese: 本文讨论了汉字的输入，显示和输出函数。

sentences.english: The teacher recommended buying an English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 老师建议买一本英汉字典。

sentences.english: The original characters are Oracle, popular in the Shang period.
sentences.chinese: 最初的汉字是甲骨文，盛行于殷商时期。

sentences.english: The command of the accurate pronunciation of polyphonic characters is the key to the standardization of Chinese character pronunciation.
sentences.chinese: 准确掌握多音异读字是人们规范认读汉字的关键。

sentences.english: We've planning out an English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在准备编一部英汉字典。

sentences.english: The irrevocable trend of the development of the Chinese characters is simplifying.
sentences.chinese: 简化是汉字发展不可逆转的走向。

sentences.english: Can you recommend me a good English – Chinese dictionary ?
sentences.chinese: 你能推荐一本好的英汉字典给我吗？

sentences.english: This is Yuli's recommendation to all foreign Chinese learners.
sentences.chinese: 这是尤里同学向外国汉字教学者推荐和码汉字学习法。

sentences.english: This is Yuli's recommendation to all foreign Chinese learners.
sentences.chinese: 这是尤里同学向外国汉字教学者推荐和码汉字学习法。

sentences.english: Our English teacher suggested our buying a good English Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 英语老师建议我们买一本好的英汉字典。

sentences.english: Paper cuts which show the Chinese character for double happiness are often used to celebrate weddings.
sentences.chinese: 剪纸汉字双喜常常用于庆祝婚礼。

sentences.english: He promised me a new English-Chinese dictionary.
sentences.chinese: 他许诺说要给我一本新英汉字典。

definition: Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
single Chinese character/word (in a foreign language)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China
pictogram (one of the Six Methods 六書|六书 of forming Chinese characters)/Chinese character derived from a picture/sometimes called hieroglyph
the small or lesser seal, the form of Chinese character standardized by the Qin dynasty
